heading: new rules
subheading: with clinton's impeachment trial under way, the senate is scrambling to set up procedures for a process that last occurred 131 years ago. democrats and republicans gather friday morning to discuss such issues as when opening statements will be heard and whether witnesses are called. a vote on how to proceed is tentatively scheduled for friday afternoon.
author: wired staff
text: with clinton's impeachment trial under way, the senate is scrambling to set up procedures for a process that last occurred 131 years ago. democrats and republicans gather friday morning to discuss such issues as when opening statements will be heard and whether witnesses are called. a vote on how to proceed is tentatively scheduled for friday afternoon.
